rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, is this all the merchandis
you have?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes...
What you see is all we have.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0003
rows.name:
I see...
So this shop also lacks
any exceptional pieces...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0004
rows.name: Ragou, hunting for weapons again?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0005
rows.name:
I'd prefer not to be lumped
together with you.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0006
rows.name:
Unlike you, I am not in the habit
of purchasing every weapon that
I set eyes upon.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0007
rows.name: Hey, I have standards too!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0008
rows.name:
You're too scattered in your interests.
First, try focusing on just
a few weapons to use.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0009
rows.name: Oh, shut up...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0010
rows.name:
That's rich coming from someone
wielding weapons with four arms!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0011
rows.name: Hmm.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0012
rows.name: Let's ask Ragou.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0013
rows.name: Which weapon is your favorite?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0014
rows.name: Don't you use projectile weapons?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0015
rows.name: What should I ask Ragou?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0016
rows.name: Which weapon's your favorite?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0017
rows.name: Don't you use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0018
rows.name: What shall I ask Ragou?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0019
rows.name: Which weapon most appeals to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0020
rows.name: Do you not use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0021
rows.name: What should I ask Ragou?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0022
rows.name: What weapon d'you like best?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0023
rows.name: Don't you use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0101
rows.name: My preferred weapon...?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0102
rows.name:
Hmm...
I don't really have one.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0103
rows.name:
Because a true warrior...
cannot afford to be selective
about his weapons.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0104
rows.name: Spear, axe, sword, hammer...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0105
rows.name:
A true warrior must be able to master
all of these weapons.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0106
rows.name:
Every weapon has
its advantages and disadvantages...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0107
rows.name:
The key to my four-weapon style is
counterbalancing their various
strengths and weaknesses.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0108
rows.name: So you master four different weapons...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0109
rows.name:
That's incredible, Ragou, with your
dedication to martial mastery.
Few people could manage such a feat.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0110
rows.name: Mastering four different weapons, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0111
rows.name:
You're really something, Ragou,
with your martial dedication.
Not many could pull that off.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0112
rows.name: Mastering four different weapons...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0113
rows.name:
Truly impressive, Ragou, with your
martial dedication. This is beyond
what normal people could achieve.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0114
rows.name: So ye master four different weapons...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0115
rows.name:
That's just like you, Ragou, with your
martial dedication. Ain't something
normal folks could do.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0116
rows.name:
It certainly isn't something
you can master in a day.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0117
rows.name:
But with enough determination,
anything is possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0118
rows.name: I shall give you training right away.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0119
rows.name: Wow...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0120
rows.name:
Having to put up with this sort of thing,
you must have it tough too.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0121
rows.name:
What are you talking about, Benkei?
You'll be training with us too.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0122
rows.name:
What?
How did I get dragged into this!?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0123
rows.name: Enough of your whining!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0124
rows.name:
Training has already begun.
Hurry up and prepare yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0125
rows.name:
Training won't give me
more arms, you know.
I refuse to participate!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0201
rows.name: I leave ranged weapons to my Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0202
rows.name:
Uh, I don't think you're quite
getting the point.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0203
rows.name:
You give your Driver a projectile
to use, then you don't use any
yourself? What's up with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0204
rows.name:
It's your own weapon,
why don't YOU try using it?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0206
rows.name: ...It's not my style.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0207
rows.name:
As a warrior,
I prefer to face my opponents
in honorable, direct combat.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0208
rows.name: How tedious...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0209
rows.name: What's your take on this?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0210
rows.name: That's so like Ragou.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0211
rows.name:
You prefer the clash of blades in a fair,
one-on-one duel.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0212
rows.name: That's typical of Ragou.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0213
rows.name:
You want the thrill of a fair fight,
blade against blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0214
rows.name:
That's quite characteristic of you,
Ragou.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0215
rows.name:
You prefer honorable combat,
a direct clash of blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0216
rows.name: That's just like you, Ragou!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0217
rows.name:
So ya prefer the direct approach -
a fair fight, blade against blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0218
rows.name:
...Impressive, my Driver.
You truly understand me.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0219
rows.name: You're fine with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0220
rows.name:
But with four arms to begin with,
how can you talk about a fair fight?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0221
rows.name: ...Hmm, you have a point.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0222
rows.name:
But having more arms doesn't
automatically make one a better fighter.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0223
rows.name:
Even four arms, if wielded without skill,
can be defeated by a single blade...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0224
rows.name:
On the other hand, a true master
can defeat numerous opponents
bare-handed.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0225
rows.name:
It all comes down to how dedicated one is
to perfecting their skills.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0226
rows.name:
That is why martial arts
are profound and interesting.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0227
rows.name: Mmm-hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0228
rows.name: Mmm-hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0229
rows.name: That's exactly right...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0230
rows.name: That's true...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0231
rows.name:
Hold on!
Are you really going along
with this nonsense?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0232
rows.name:
This guy is being totally unfair,
you know!?
